TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProxyWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart
Public MustInherit Class ProxyWebPart Inherits WebPart

summary.span: 表示 Web 組件控制項的基底類別，這些控制項在特定條件下必須取代頁面上的其他 Web 組件控制項。

span.span: Represents the base class for Web Parts controls that under certain conditions must replace other Web Parts controls on a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一組 Web 組件控制項的基底類別，例如和，可做為預留位置的頁面上的其他 Web 組件控制項。 is the base class for a set of Web Parts controls, such as and , that can be used as placeholders for other Web Parts controls on a page. 一般而言，某種類型的錯誤或失敗發生時，控制項將會取代另一個 Web 組件控制項。Typically, a control will replace another Web Parts control when some type of error or failure has occurred. 例如，當使用者未獲授權檢視頁面上的 Web 組件控制項，Web 組件控制項的預定取代控制項。For example, when a user is not authorized to view a Web Parts control on a page, the intended Web Parts control is replaced with the control. 當無法載入 Web 組件控制項，或無法建立它的新執行個體時，取代原始的 Web 組件控制項控制項。When a Web Parts control cannot be loaded or a new instance of it cannot be created, the original Web Parts control is replaced with the control. 如果 Web 組件控制項稍後想要變得可供使用者，它將會還原至頁面和物件衍生自類別將會移除。If the intended Web Parts control later becomes available to the user, it will be restored to the page and the object derived from the class will be removed. 類別不會儲存檢視狀態或控制項的狀態。The class does not save view state or control state. 如果 Web 組件控制項取代物件，並在之後變成可用，其檢視狀態和控制項狀態會是空的。If a Web Parts control is replaced by a object and then later becomes available, its view state and control state will be empty. 物件會保留個人化資料，這些 Web 組件控制項取代它。The object preserves personalization data for the Web Parts control that it replaced. 如果原始的 Web 組件控制項變成可用時，將會還原其個人化資料。If the original Web Parts control becomes available, its personalization data will be restored. 當控制項儲存個人化資料，不會儲存屬性物件。When the control saves personalization data, it does not save the properties of a object. 相反地，它會將儲存控制項的屬性，物件取代。Instead, it saves the properties of the control that the object replaced. 如果原始的 Web 組件控制項可供使用，控制項將會自動將其載入。If the original Web Parts control becomes available, the control will automatically load it. 物件包含物件。The object contains the object. Web 組件控制項可以從擷取的預定的識別碼屬性或屬性。The ID of the intended Web Parts control can be retrieved from the property or the property. 如果物件會取代為提供者或取用者的 Web 組件連接的 Web 組件控制項、 連線未啟用，但不是會被刪除。If a object replaces a Web Parts control that is either the provider or consumer of a Web Parts connection, the connection is not activated but will not be deleted. 如果原始的 Web 組件控制項變成可用時，連接將會重新啟動。If the original Web Parts control becomes available, the connection will be reactivated.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 當靜態 Web 組件控制項 (或伺服器或使用者控制項) 必須被取代時，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class when a static Web Parts control (or server or user control) must be replaced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式用來建立 proxy Web 組件控制項，以取代靜態 Web 組件控制項。This constructor is used to create a proxy Web Parts control to replace a static Web Parts control. 若要取代動態建立的 Web 組件控制項，請使用建構函式來建立 proxy Web 組件控制項。To replace a dynamically created Web Parts control, use the constructor to create the proxy Web Parts control.

param.name: originalID

span.span: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the control to replace.

param.span: 如果 控制項被取代，則此 ID 為其子伺服器控制項的 ID。

span.span: If a control is replaced, the ID is the ID of its child server control.

param.name: originalTypeName
param.span: 字串，為將被取代之控制項的 名稱。

span.span: A string that is the name of the of the control to replace.

param.span: 如果 控制項被取代，則此型別名稱為其子伺服器控制項的型別。

span.span: If a control is replaced, the type name is the type of its child server control.

param.name: originalPath
param.span: 字串，含有將被取代之使用者控制項的路徑。

span.span: A string that contains the path to the user control to replace.

param.name: genericWebPartID
param.span: 字串，傳回 控制項的 ID，如果正在取代該控制項型別。

span.span: A string that returns the ID of a control, if that type of control is being replaced.

param.span: 不是從 基底類別繼承的控制項需要這項資訊。

span.span: This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the base class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class when a dynamic Web Parts control must be replaced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式用來建立 proxy Web 組件控制項，以取代動態的 Web 組件控制項。This constructor is used to create a proxy Web Parts control to replace a dynamic Web Parts control. 若要取代靜態 Web 組件控制項，請使用建構函式來建立 proxy Web 組件控制項。To replace a static Web Parts control, use the constructor to create a proxy Web Parts control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當物件取代控制項，此屬性包含的值從屬性。When a object replaces a control, this property contains the value from the property.

span.span: Gets or sets the programmatic identifier assigned to the Web Parts control.
A containing the identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會包含在相同的值及其屬性做為它所取代的控制項。The object will contain the same value in its property as the control it replaced.

span.span: Overrides to prevent loading previously saved state for a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法覆寫以防止載入的控制項狀態。The method overrides to prevent loading the control state. 方法不會載入的控制項狀態，或執行任何其他動作。The method does not load the control state or perform any other action.
